statements: DELETE FROM convergence_behavior WHERE algorithm_name = 'Genetic Algorithm';
DELETE FROM convergence_behavior WHERE algorithm_name = 'Genetic Algorithm' AND convergence_rate < 0.05;
DELETE FROM convergence_history WHERE convergence_status = TRUE AND optimization_id = 10;
DELETE FROM QuantumOptimization WHERE optimization_id = 200 AND convergence_threshold > 0.5;
DELETE FROM OptimizationHistory WHERE convergence_status = FALSE AND iteration_number > 100;
DELETE FROM QuantumOptimization WHERE optimization_type = 'Simulated Annealing' AND convergence_threshold < 0.1;
DELETE FROM QuantumOptimizationData WHERE optimization_id = 100 AND iteration < 10;
DELETE FROM OptimizationAlgorithm WHERE algorithm_name = 'Gradient Descent';
DELETE FROM OptimizationHistory WHERE iteration_number < 100 AND optimization_loss > 0.5;
